docs.snippet: Returning Chelsea striker Diego Costa did not just let his predatory right foot do his talking for him on Sunday. A pair of gesturing hands were just as eloquent as he appeared to be making a point to his critics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Returning Chelsea striker Diego Costa did not just let his predatory right foot do his talking for him on Sunday. A pair of gesturing hands were just as eloquent as he appeared to be making a point to his critics.

headline.main: Costa Lets Hands Do the Talking on Superb Chelsea Return
headline.print_headline: Costa Lets Hands Do the Talking on Superb Chelsea Return

docs.snippet: Matt Ryan tumbled into the end zone, slammed the ball to the turf with a thunderous spike, and let out a scream that showed just how much he wanted this game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Matt Ryan tumbled into the end zone, slammed the ball to the turf with a thunderous spike, and let out a scream that showed just how much he wanted this game.

headline.main: Super Falcons: Atlanta Routs Packers 44-21 for NFC Title
headline.print_headline: Super Falcons: Atlanta Routs Packers 44-21 for NFC Title
